content.title: Reinventing Signal Bridges
content.body:
# Reinventing Signal Bridges

Cross-network messaging still relies on heavyweight relayers and trust assumptions. Token-bound accounts give us a composable slot to authenticate state shifts without running a validator zoo.

## A Minimal Shape
- Assign a deterministic account per post.
- Cache attestations client-side.
- Defer heavyweight infra until behaviour is proven.

## Why It Matters
Latency is product-critical. Practical heuristics—like the personalization toggle we ship in Phase 1—are the best way to measure perceived usefulness before launching the on-chain indexer.
content.summary: Token-bound accounts let us rebuild bridges with less trust and more composability.
